__e: And now the irony of this whole situation...
For it is the cruel irony of life That we are destined to hold the dark with the light, The good with the evil.
For it is the cruel irony of life that we are destined to hold the dark with the light, the good with the evil.
The irony is that I work so hard to keep people alive and then they end up hating me for it.
Well, irony of ironies, the money I got from your grandpa took us out of the running for financial aid 'cause it made it look like we have money.
The irony is that if you want to die, you just have to stay where you are.
Don't bother trying to explain the irony ; she doesn't see it.
I think you can appreciate the irony. They certainly can't.
While I appreciate the irony, I don't plan on giving him the satisfaction.
Is it ironic that here we are presented with the opportunity to give up our powers, and now we suddenly can't even use them?
Like the irony of you coming here just when most of us me included, are getting ready to leave.
Life's full of ironies, isn't it?
That could not be further from the truth.
